name: Lone (impuuuu)
description:
Explore the art of loneliness as you explore a mysterious gas station's convenience store.

A text-heavy game with quirky dialogues and cute art. Takes < 20 minutes to complete. WASD + Space bar.

Creation

Created as a multimedia project for a creative writing class over a weekend and a Friday since it was due Monday morning. Made in Unity.

--

Me - Design, Narrative, Programming, Level design

Terry Nguyen - Art

David Chew - Music
